pkgmetadata.longdescription: Automated Phylogenetic Sequence Cluster Identification from 'GenBank' // A pipeline for the identification, within taxonomic groups, of orthologous sequence clusters from 'GenBank' https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/genbank/ as the first step in a phylogenetic analysis. The pipeline depends on a local alignment search tool and is, therefore, not dependent on differences in gene naming conventions and naming errors.
